page.title: 05Our School - Hatfield Heath
page.content: Our school is 86 years old. The school was built in 1899 and on the foundation stone it says,{"This stone {was laid by the very Reverend Henry {Montague Buttle D.D. Master of Trinity {College, Cambridge. Wednesday 25th {October 1899."} There is a legend that behind the foundation stone there is a pot of gold. We have about 130 children attending our school with five classes. As well as the old Victorian building we have a new block which at present houses the younger children and we have our own swimming pool. Unfortunately we do not have our own hall and we have to make use of the nearby village hall for dinners and other activities. There are many out of school clubs at school such as, football, netball, chess, computers, country dancing, athletics, swimming, cricket and 5 star awards.
